grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 吐露【トロ】expressing one's mind, speaking out
噴出性嘔吐【フンシュツセイオウト】projectile vomiting
kun reading compounds: 吐く【はく】to vomit, to throw up, to spit up, to emit, to send forth, to breathe out, to give (an opinion), to make (a comment), to express, to tell, to confess
吐く息【はくいき】exhaled air, one's breath
吐く【つく】to breathe out, to breathe, to tell (a lie), to use (foul language), to vomit, to throw up, to spit up
